title: (9125) Caniço - 372 Estrada do Cristo Rei
description: Parking of the statue of Christ Garajau. Nice sea view. A little noisy at night with the coming from the locals. We had planned to sleep on the beach parking downstairs, but it closes the night. Public toilets next to the Teleferico

title: (9125) Caniço - 6 Estrada do Cristo Rei
description: Parking right next to the sea. There's a restaurant, open showers on the beach and public toilets with indoor showers as well. The access gate to the parking closes during the night when the restaurant closes, so you can't spend the night.

title: (9060-021) Funchal - 346 Rua do Lazareto
description: Spectacular views, from a very quiet viewpoint. There is a small gas station a few meters away, to fill the van with water.

title: (9050) Funchal -
description: Parking available day and night with plenty of space available. Bus stop nearby to get off at Funchal. At the entrance of the Quinta Jardins do Imperador, less than 5min walk from the Parque do Monte municipal park which is right next to the Church of Monte (Igreja Paroquial de Nossa Senhora do Monte / Santuário de Nossa Senhora do Monte) the carreiros do Monte (descent on sled for 2km), the tropical garden and the two cable cars. Very easy to walk around the gardens and Funchal from this point.

title: () Santo António da Serra - ER202
description: Quiet spot surrounded by nature. There are benches with tables where you can enjoy your meal. Parking is flat and located in beautiful point of view.

title: (9000-269) Funchal - 55 Rua do Engenho Velho
description: laundry service

title: (P475+29) Camacha - Unnamed Road
description: Super picnic area, well shaded under the trees and well sheltered from the wind. Very peaceful night without passing a car. Perfect for the night.

title: (ER103) Funchal - Unnamed Road
description: Small picnic area with barbecue a few meters from the flat car park. No shade but it's quite cool in the evening because it's quite high up. Relatively protected from the wind. Close to the road but there is no one there at night.

title: (9000-247) Funchal - Nº5 Rua da Praia Formosa
title_short: (9000-247) Funchal - Nº5 Rua da Praia Formosa
description: Quiet and accessible place. Next to the beach.

title: (9000) Funchal - 293 Estrada Monumental
description: Spacious parking which is paid, but costs maximum 10eur. Location is really quiet during the night and it is next to the beach. You can feel safe as there is cctv camera. There are also nice bars where you can get coffee or drink.

title: (9225) Funchal - Unnamed Road
description: Public picnic place with tables, grills and awesome view.

title: (9200-090) Machico - 10 Rua do Senhor Dos Milagres
title_short: (9200-090) Machico - 10 Rua do Senhor Dos Milagres
description: Free parking without height limitation. 5 minutes walk from the beach. On the side of the road. Fairly smooth floor.

title: (9200-084) Machico - Rua do Leiria
description: Easy access parking, facing the sea and motorhome parking authorized

title: (9200-075) Machico - Túnel Fazenda
description: Sale of camping gas cylinders with screw caps

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Magnificent place a few hundred meters from the top of pico do arieiro. very beautiful view on the summit and 360 °! land a few meters from the main road. access by motorhome = ok. we spent the night of the stars there. Grandiose !!

title: (9100) Machico -
description: Nice high vantage point, good for overnight stays with smaller campers. Relatively flat green area to stand on, goats can be heard at night in summer, very few cars and planes are audible.

title: (9000-421) Funchal - Unnamed road
description: Parking next to hotel with really nice view.

title: (9225) Porto da Cruz - Caminho da Maiata
title_short: (9225) Porto da Cruz - Caminho da Maiata
description: Spot right next to the sea. open showers at the beach (5m away)

title: (9225) Porto da Cruz -
description: Good place with amazing view

title: (9300) Câmara de Lobos - 87 Túnel Cabo Girão
title_short: (9300) Câmara de Lobos - 87 Túnel Cabo Girão
description: Right next to the church "Santuário de Nossa Senhora de Fátima" and above the well-known Cabo Girao parking lot with great views on both sides. The church has toilets during opening hours.

title: (9225) Porto da Cruz - R. da Praia
title_short: (9225) Porto da Cruz - R. da Praia
description: Super nice place for the day  :) directly at the ocean. Quiet, just some hikers starting there trip. Close to some restaurants in Porto da Cruz and close to the public nature swimming pool. We enjoyed our stay here and came back 2 times.

title: (9225-050) Porto da Cruz - 20 Rua Padre João Faria
title_short: (9225-050) Porto da Cruz - 20 Rua Padre João Faria
description: public toilet

title: (9225) Porto da Cruz - 17 Caminho do Penedo
title_short: (9225) Porto da Cruz - 17 Caminho do Penedo
description:
Parking along the sea on a ground wave to the right of the village.
Priori future work

title: (9225) Porto da Cruz - 7 Rua Doutor João Abel de Freitas
title_short: (9225) Porto da Cruz - 7 Rua Doutor João Abel de Freitas
description: Beach parking lot, very well located in the very nice village. Superb viewpoint, coastal walk, swimming, seawater swimming pool, a few shops. The public toilets nearby are a bit dilapidated, you can take advantage of the (the only) beach shower. Very quiet parking at night. Containment may have something to do with it ...

address.street: 7 Rua Doutor João Abel de Freitas

title: (9200-032) Caniçal - 1 Rua do Porto
description: Parking nearby the beach, surrounded with few bars

title: (9230) Santana - Unnamed Road
description: Car park located at the end of the road from Santana, departure point for hikes including that of the Ruivo peak. Well-designed trails (I would even say too much, it loses its charm…) and breathtaking views. Huge car park with superb views of the valleys and peaks. Negative point linked to the success of the site: no sanitary facilities. Be careful when walking off the trails around the parking lot ...

title: (9230) Faial - Estr. da Praia do Faial n. 12
title_short: (9230) Faial - Estr. da Praia do Faial n. 12
description: Realy nice stay overnight, very calm and not busy parking lot. Near restaurant with franceshinas. Around 20 parking places.

address.street: Estr. da Praia do Faial n. 12

title: (9230) - 9 Levada do Caldeirão Verde
description: Parking in Quemadas Park. The day we arrived the parking barriers were high (so free parking) and we were able to park the RV and sleep at night. If there is a charge for parking I don't know if that is possible. (It is indicated 3 euros per day). At night we were all alone and quiet. The road up to the parking lot (and therefore the start of the park) is quite steep and slippery. No water point nearby (paying toilets must be sure there is water inside). We came at 7pm and had to pull a ticket. However, the exit barrier is open from 8:30 p.m. The ticket counter and the cafe are then closed. Internet can be obtained from the open WLAN of the café :)

title: (9230) - Estrada da Praia do Faial
description: Parking by the sea. Easy access and toilets and showers nearby. very quiet at night with the sound of the waves. restaurant nearby. beautiful view of the river, sea and cliff.

title: (9300-226) Campanário - Unnamed Road
description:
Viewpoint at the end of a road without any services. Awesome view.
Enough space to turn around.

title: (9200) Canical Pontoon D - ER109
description: Parking next to Prainha do Caniçal. The beach restaurant down at the beach has toilets (paid) and a public shower (no shampoo allowed).

title: (9230) - Estrada do Guindaste
description: A few parking spaces at the end of a road. access by motorhome possible (a good climb for the return but doable). the parking spaces are a little on slopes. very beautiful point of view (magnificent !!!) and picnic tables. we didn't sleep there as we wanted a flatter space for the kids and a little less dangerous place for the little ones to play. (cliffs nearby).

title: (9200-044) Canical - ER109
description: Parking near the start of the hike to Pointe de Sao Lourenço. Flat and calm place, close to a small village type tourist residence where there does not seem to be any inhabitant. During the day the planes pass over the parking lot but not in the middle of the night. Possibility to park 4, 5 motorhomes.

title: (9200) Caniçal - ER109
description: Small parking lot on the side of the road with a great view.

title: (9200) Caniçal - ER109
description: Parking lot of the San Lorenço presentation tip to the view a little frequent night wind but sure enough

title: (9200) Caniçal - Unnamed Road
description: Mirador of Ponta da Rosto.

title: (9350) Campanario - Caminho da Glória
description: Dead end of road, flat parking, sea view.

title: (9350) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking at Miradouro do Espigão. Great viewpoint above the valleys with two benches and a water tap.

title: (9230-082) Santana - 2 Rua Comandante Camache de Freitas
title_short: (9230-082) Santana - 2 Rua Comandante Camache de Freitas
description: Public toilet with a tap water acces by a wall spigot.

title: (9350) Ribeira Brava - 36 Caminho da Pedra
description: Magnificent view of Ribeira Brava at sunset. easy parking, a bit of traffic though.

title: (9240) Vargem - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place which is mainly designed for people who spend the night in a tent. There is a toilet building with toilets, barbecue and picnic tables. It is difficult to stand upright here. Very peaceful and quiet.

title: (9230) São Jorge - Estudante do Calhau de São Jorge
title_short: (9230) São Jorge - Estudante do Calhau de São Jorge
description: Quiet location with beautiful view of river, ocean and a nice bridge! toilets and showers nearby.

address.street: Estudante do Calhau de São Jorge

title: (9230) São Jorge - Unnamed Road
description: Toilets and water tap before the church for the tank of the motorhome

title: (9360-524) Ponta do Sol - 5 Casa Paroquial
description:
Parking next to a church with plenty of shadow and flat enough.
Quiet during the night, busy during the day as it's the starting point of a famous trek.

title: (9240-048) Boaventura - Unnamed Road
description: Nice spot in a nature close to the sea

title: (9360-218) Ponta do Sol - 9360 Rua Doutor João Augusto Teixeira
title_short: (9360-218) Ponta do Sol - 9360 Rua Doutor João Augusto Teixeira
description: Paid parking from 8am, but you can arrive later in the night (after 7pm) and only pay for the time before you leave in the morning. Next to the beach with cafes and public toilets.

title: (9360) Ponta do Sol - 347 Túnel Ponta do Sol
title_short: (9360) Ponta do Sol - 347 Túnel Ponta do Sol
description:
Parking in front of the cute chapel in a dead end street

OK for night and day parking
Waterpoint
Great view
Close to a bar and small shop

title: (9360) Ponta do Sol - Caminho dos Poios
title_short: (9360) Ponta do Sol - Caminho dos Poios
description: Small area at the dead end of residential road. Stunning view at the ocean and the city.

title: (9360) São Tiago - Unnamed Road
description: Nice small parking space with a view. It is on a cliff, road to get here is ok, solid asphalt road, but in some places narrow, so I would be careful with bigger motorhomes. We spent a night here, it was quiet, some bird screamed once at night but that was it. There is a trash bin next to the benches.

title: (9240) Fajã da Areia - 93 ER101
description: We were here on low season, coffe-bar was closed. It is a spacious empty parking with ocean view. We stayed overnight alone. Beautiful view to the beach, waves and sunset. The beach has showers, but we found no wc! Beach known as good surfing spot, has a good ocean side walk. During afternoon we saw some locals walking and fishing.

title: (9360) Ponta do Sol -
description: Very nice flat spot in the middle of nature. Really quiet and such fresh air in the morning. Lots of stars in the night. Close to the Levada 25 fontes walk a.o.

title: (9360) Socorro -
description: Spot in the middle of nature at the edge of a very quiet road at night. Ideal for seeing the stars and enjoying a quiet evening. 1 or 2 places maximum. Do not go further on the path to the wind turbines because it is prohibited.

title: (9240) São Vicente - 2 Estrada Dom João V
title_short: (9240) São Vicente - 2 Estrada Dom João V
description: Large earthen square, flat, slightly set back from the road in order to be able to enjoy the calm. River nearby flowing into the sea.

title: (9360) - 30 ER101
description: Parking on the road, just a sidewalk apart from the ocean. Peaceful aerea and flat. Close to the tunnel to get to via rapida. Beautiful side walk along the rocky beach

title: (9370) Lombo Do Doutor -
description: Large plain, motorable road to access it. Very flat ground. We were alone, surrounded by the mountains, in the middle of the plain. Very quiet and easily accessible.

title: (9370) - ER110
description: Parking near La Chapelle. Quiet and in nature

title: (9370) Calheta - ER110
description:
Rabacal car park.
The parking lot serves as a starting point for the “25 Fontes” hikes and the “Risco” waterfall. During the day the place is packed. We went there in the evening and spent the night there. We were completely alone and were therefore able to start the hikes early in the morning. As the morning progresses, the hikes seem to be very crowded

title: (9370) Estreito da Calheta - ER209
description: Very quiet place.

title: (9270-134) Seixal - Estr. Regional 221
description: Parking in the middle of a magnificent place with a 360° view

title: (9270) Seixal - Caminho da Delfina Fernandes Correia
title_short: (9270) Seixal - Caminho da Delfina Fernandes Correia
description:
Parking just next to the beautiful black sand beach in Seixal. Perfect for midnight swim and sunrise in the bay.
Few people came to party at night but other than that you sleep with the sound of the waves it's perfect.
Toilets available 24/7 and tap that can be used as a shower on the Dock.

title: (9270) Seixal - 9270 Rua do Moinho da Cruz
title_short: (9270) Seixal - 9270 Rua do Moinho da Cruz
description: Lovely spot with a great view on the ocean. It is located also nearby natural swimming pools where you can find showers and toilet. There are also benches where you can enjoy your meal.

title: (9270) Seixal - Frente de Mar do Seixal
title_short: (9270) Seixal - Frente de Mar do Seixal
description: Parking just above the natural pools of Seixal. Be careful, the slope is important. It takes a good engine in my opinion to go up. We are in T6. Otherwise, very quiet (noise waves anyway), and beautiful views. Toilets and showers (cold) open when we were there.

title: (9270) Seixal - Rua do Porto da Laje
title_short: (9270) Seixal - Rua do Porto da Laje
description:
Parking in a deadend road
Noisy because of a waterfall
Fishing spot

title: (9270) - ER209
description:
Nice Picnic Area in the forest  - bbq - water - benches.
Recomended.

title: (9270) -
description: Very nice place to spend the night. nice view, flat. tables available. be careful, however, if you have children because there are a lot of ticks! (surely related to free cows). 10 minutes walk from magnificent multi-centenary laurels and a lake (only in winter. in summer it is dry)

title: (9370-410) Jardim do Mar - 2 Rua do Portinho
title_short: (9370-410) Jardim do Mar - 2 Rua do Portinho
description: Comfortable and quiet parking, on the flat down road, next to the sidewalk to the Ocean . End road with large space to turn. A restaurant and beach access and nice walk all along the ocean. Great sound of the ocean. Easy to arrive with heavy campervan

title: (9270) Ribeira da Janela - ER209
description: Parking for the night ideal if you want to be sheltered from the wind. Seen on the mountains, very beautiful lights at sunset. Departure of hiking in direct proximity (PR14), and 5 minutes from the forest of Fanal. No trash or water, provide the necessary.

title: (9270) Ribeira da Janela - 19 Caminho do Ribeirinho
title_short: (9270) Ribeira da Janela - 19 Caminho do Ribeirinho
description: Public toilet with water connection on the left side of the building.

title: (9270) - ER209
description: Entrance to the beach with a viewpoint on foot, excellent with 24-hour shower or bathroom service. The power station shuts down at night so that no noise is heard. Strong wind but no problem

title: (9370-510) Paúl do Mar - 4 4ª Vereda do Porto
title_short: (9370-510) Paúl do Mar - 4 4ª Vereda do Porto
description: Wonderful parking lot right at the port. Suitable for day and night.

title: (9270) Ribeira da Janela -
description: Very quiet parking area in a dead end, near a river. 360° view of the mountains and its vineyards. We spent the night there and did not meet anyone, calm and lulled by the river.

title: (9370) Faja da Ovelha - ER101
description: Very quiet parking to spend the night, it has tables and some containers. It is 15 minutes from a surf spot.

title: (9370) Paúl do Mar - Impasse do Entulho
title_short: (9370) Paúl do Mar - Impasse do Entulho
description:
Parking along the road in front of the sea
Surf spot
Bar and restaurant around

title: (9270) Levada Grande - Caminho da Borda
description: Parking next to a soccer field, lots of space, no wind, very quiet and in nature.

title: (9270-095) Porto Moniz - 13 Rua dos Alfarrobeiras
description: Free ground parking day and night. There is a toilet open day and night. Very quiet at night but very popular during the day since the natural pools are a 3-minute walk away. Dark area at night as there are few streetlights and fairly stable and straight ground.

title: (9370) Fajã da Ovelha - Caminho do Massapez
title_short: (9370) Fajã da Ovelha - Caminho do Massapez
description: Nice viewpoint to spend a night

title: (9270-095) Porto Moniz - 35 Rua da Escola Velha
title_short: (9270-095) Porto Moniz - 35 Rua da Escola Velha
description:
Parking lot to walk to Porto Moniz. Not that crowded. We walked from here to the natural pools about 10 minutes.
It may also be possible to stand here overnight.

title: (9270) Porto Moniz - 9270 Rua do Cabo Calhau
title_short: (9270) Porto Moniz - 9270 Rua do Cabo Calhau
description: Small parking lot with gazebo on the ocean. Toilets (closed to our passage), beautiful view of the sea. Close to houses.

title: (9270) Santa Maria Madalena - Vereda da Ladeira
title_short: (9270) Santa Maria Madalena - Vereda da Ladeira
description: Beautiful viewspot with a big parking lot. Quite windy but a great place with beautiful view

title: (9385) Lombada Velha - 9385 Rua da Capela
description: Great place next to a church where you get a stunning ocean view and you have it close to view on the cliffs…recommended for sunset

name: Miradouro do Fio
title: (9385) Miradouro do Fio
description: Miradouro with stunning sunset view!

title: (9385) Ponta do Pargo - Unnamed Road
description:
Punta do Pargo Lighthouse Parking
Magnificent view
Great restaurant a bit higher

title: (9400) Ponta - Unnamed Road
description: Land with great view of the island. Magnificent sunset a little further on the watchtower. Picnic area for islanders. In September we were alone from evening until morning, very quiet. Faucet, picnic table. I recommend this beautiful spot!
